column4: hello im using unr on an acer aspire one. my microphone sounds real crunchy and doesnt pick up enough sound to hear. I followed the guide on the unr wiki to install the alsa driver 1.0.20 and it helped a little i guess, can someone help me fix my mic please?
its maxed out on the icon on the taskbar and its maxed in alsamixer
its not ruined quality its not loud enough to hear
